datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to improvisation, swing rhythms, and iconic jazz musicians.

columns.name: stage_presence_intensity
columns.description: Quantified measure of the musician's energy and engagement during live performances.

columns.name: artist_international_collaborations
columns.description: Count of distinct international artists the ensemble has collaborated with.

columns.name: collaboration_count_with_known_jazz_musicians
columns.description: Number of collaborations with musicians recognized in the jazz genre.

columns.name: uses_swing_rhythms
columns.description: Indicator whether swing rhythms are used exclusively by the musician.

columns.name: total_music_awards_won
columns.description: Total number of music awards won by the ensemble throughout their career.

columns.name: marketing_reach
columns.description: Binary indicator whether the venue's marketing is local or global.

columns.name: avg_performance_duration
columns.description: Average duration of setlist in hours per performance.

columns.name: latest_album_commercial_success
columns.description: Indicates whether the ensemble's latest album was commercially successful (sold over 10,000 copies).

columns.name: years_playing_jazz
columns.description: Number of years the musician has been actively playing jazz music.

columns.name: percentage_sold_out_shows
columns.description: The percentage of shows that are fully sold out in a season per venue.

columns.name: international_song_percentage
columns.description: Percentage of songs in the ensemble's setlist that are international.

columns.name: region_jazz_popularity
columns.description: Popularity of jazz in the musician's primary active region on a scale from low to high.

columns.name: overseas_performance_count
columns.description: Total number of performances the ensemble has held outside their home country.

columns.name: number_of_improvisations_per_week
columns.description: Number of improvisations the musician engages in during performances per week.

columns.name: artist_fame_level
columns.description: A scale representing the fame of the artist, ranging from local to international recognition.

columns.name: ticket_price
columns.description: The standard ticket price for the venue.

columns.name: festival_participation_count
columns.description: Total number of jazz festivals the ensemble has participated in.

columns.name: avg_audience_size
columns.description: Average audience size per festival.

columns.name: social_media_following
columns.description: The total count of followers of the venue’s official social media accounts.

columns.name: unique_song_releases_last_year
columns.description: Number of unique songs released by the ensemble in the previous year.

columns.name: average_income_area
columns.description: Average income of the area where the venue is located.

columns.name: jazz_genre_historicity
columns.description: Score representing the historic and cultural significance of the artist's primary jazz genre, scaled from 1 to 5.

columns.name: years_of_experience
columns.description: The number of years the musician has been performing jazz.

columns.name: weekend_performance
columns.description: Whether the performance is held on a weekend.

columns.name: original_compositions
columns.description: Binary value indicating whether the artist primarily performs original compositions (True) or covers (False).

columns.name: genre_specific_events
columns.description: Number of genre-specific events (e.g., jazz) the venue hosts annually.

columns.name: music_style_complexity
columns.description: Count of distinct jazz genres performed by the ensemble.

columns.name: performance_complexity
columns.description: A quantifiable measure of the improvisational and technical complexity of the artist's performance, scaled from 1 to 10.

columns.name: experience_to_improvisation_ratio
columns.description: Ratio of years of experience to the number of improvisations per week.

columns.name: total_jazz_albums
columns.description: Total number of albums released by the musician that primarily feature jazz music.

columns.name: venue_type
columns.description: The type of venue, categorizing its primary use and setting.

queries.question: Is there a relationship between the number of jazz festivals an ensemble participates in and factors such as the total number of unique songs released in the past year, the total music awards won by the ensemble, and the success of their latest album in the market?
queries.true_hypothesis: The total number of jazz festivals an ensemble participates in depends on the number of unique songs released in the past year, the total music awards won by the ensemble, and the success of their latest album in the market.
